title: Champion Store
body:
Hi everyone! This is my first time posting in the boards and i am not sure if i am posting in the right section. Sorry in advance if i am doing it wrong.

Recently I have been having trouble buying champions from the store. When i click on UNLOCK nothing happens. 
I can only buy champions by going to my profile and through that from the champions tab.
The store is not working for me. Can anyone tell me whats wrong. {{champion:32}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
